original_text: And the scribe said unto him, Well, Master, thou hast said the truth: for there is one God; and there is none other but he:
korean_text: 서기관이 이르되 선생님이여 옳소이다 하나님은 한 분이시요 그 외에 다른 이가 없다 하신 말씀이 참이니이다

sentences.original_text: And the scribe said unto him,
Well, Master, thou hast said the truth:
and there is none other but he:
